title: Excelent service..the management is one of the best. im there ones a month ...every month. Sheraton Kampala is the best
text: I can asure you as a frequent customer sheraton kampala is the best cost effective hotel in town. Amazing service and people reallu care of you. Best central location by far. .im every month there and i love it. Trust me you will enjoy.
